name: core_simd::vector::mask_up_to

core_simd::simd::num::uint::SimdUint::ca.doc:
Performs elementwise conversion of this vector's elements to another SIMD-valid type.

 This follows the semantics of Rust's `as` conversion for casting integers (wrapping to
 other integer types, and saturating to float types).

core_simd::simd::cmp::ord::SimdPartialOr.doc: Test if each element is less than the corresponding element in `other`.

core_simd::masks::Mask::<T, N>::cast.doc: Converts the mask to a mask of any other element size.
